benchmark_details.name: AIR-B ENCH (Automated Heterogeneous Information Retrieval Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: AIR-B ENCH is a new information retrieval benchmark characterized by its automated, heterogeneous, and dynamic features, providing diverse and high-quality testing data generated without human intervention.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: Advance the evaluation techniques for information retrieval models by providing a versatile and comprehensive benchmark.

data.annotation: Automatically generated using large language models

methodology.calculation: Standard evaluation metrics for retrieval tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better retrieval performance.
methodology.baseline_results: Results against existing benchmarks like MTEB and BEIR.
methodology.validation: Comparative evaluation against human-labeled data sets

harm: Bias in generated outputs due to language model limitations

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: All generated testing data in AIR-B ENCH is licensed under CC BY-NC-SA-4.0.
